snippet.title: Beat Down : Fists of Vengeance - OFFICIAL TRAILER
snippet.description:
This is the official annoucement of the street fighting video game : 
Beat Down - Fists of Vengeance 
Edited by CAPCOM, the game came out in October 2005. This clip is from a demo CD which was included with the n°98 of Playstation 2 Magazine in June 2005.
You will notice in this clip the game is in Beta version. The development  was still going on for the final release.
To me, this is the best fighting game of all time. I mean no Tekken, no Street Fighter, no Mortal Kombat or anyelse fighting game can equal it. This is CAPCOM Finest.
